document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Helmfast Villa on Catchthief Alley.
document_data.name: Helmfast Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Helmfast Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Helmfast]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the south section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] on the southeast corner of where [[Catchthief Alley]] met [[Golden Serpent Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The walled estate contained three separate buildings arranged around a garden. The buildings stood three stories tall.
